title: Lover
lyrics:
Made the decision, I need you here tonight
[?], I want you by my side
That guy's in trouble, [?]
'Cause I'm a gangsta, [?]
I want you

This is what it feels

I want you

It's the truth

Nothing else is real

Me and you



[?]



Lover, tell me if you wanna be my lover

'Cause it' clear that we just like each other

won't you stay and let me be your lover, lover, lover, lover



[?] - RAP



Sometimes I dream of a better world

but in the streets we're fighting more and more

'cause we're defending what we call our rights

[?]



I want you

This is what it feels

I want you

Me and you

Nothing [?]

Me and you



Lover, tell me if you wanna be my lover

'Cause it' clear that we just like each other

won't you stay and let me be your lover, lover, lover, lover



I want you
